text: Thanks for Sharing is a comedy-drama movie that was released in September 2013. The movie is about sexual addiction and the lives of people in New York City. Tim Robbins is Mike, Gwyneth Paltrow is Phoebe, Carol Kane is Roberta and singer Pink is Dede. The movie was given mixed review from critics. It was filmed and produced during 2012. Category:2013 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Lionsgate movies
title: Thanks for Sharing
